subject: Horse Racing
Steroids
Suspensions, Dismissals and Resignations
lead_paragraph: Todd Pletcher faces a possible suspension after a horse he trains tested positive for the prohibited drug procaine after her third-place finish in the Breeders’ Cup Filly and Mare Turf at Santa Anita.
snippet: Todd Pletcher faces a possible suspension after a horse he trains tested positive for the prohibited drug procaine after her third-place finish in the Breeders’ Cup Filly and Mare Turf at Santa Anita.
